name: .ESQ File Extension
summary: Learn about .ESQ files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Data file created by Pfaff embroidery machines; saves references to multiple .EMB embroidery files, but does not contain the embroidery designs themselves; stores information such as the hoop placement for the designs; allows designs to be sequenced one after another.

content: ESQ files are used for sequencing multiple designs together. They save space on the machine's storage card since they only reference the location of designs rather than storing the designs.
Embroidery sequence files can be transferred to the computer using a program in the Pfaff creative 3D Suite called the "creative 3D File Assistant."
NOTE: Pfaff machines are created by the VSM Group.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
